Articles.Content: Hey all. I am working on a strut add on, and I'm working on the base models in Blender. Just one question: what are the dimensions of the Cubic Octagonal Strut, the Modular Girder Segment, and the Modular Girder Segment XL? I haven't been able to find dimension info on them because they don't go with the standard KSP dimension "increments". Thanks for any help.
best bet is use the mu importer for blender and pull the mesh out as a reference

best bet is use the mu importer for blender and pull the mesh out as a reference

Hmm. Never thought of that. Thanks.
